Language barriers: If you don't speak the local language, you may struggle to communicate with locals and navigate unfamiliar environments.
Safety concerns: Traveling to unfamiliar places can be dangerous, especially if you are not aware of potential risks and hazards.
Visa and immigration paperwork: Obtaining visas and completing immigration paperwork can be a time-consuming and frustrating process, especially if there are delays or complications.
Health issues: Traveling to different countries may expose you to new diseases and health risks, and you may need to take special precautions to avoid getting sick.
Transportation challenges: Navigating unfamiliar transportation networks can be a challenge, and you may struggle to find reliable and safe options.
